name: Advanced Blocks Pro
author: Essa Mamdani

sections.description:
Transform your web page creation process with the Advanced Blocks Pro in Gutenberg editor’s dynamic and feature-rich blocks. With an extensive range of options, each block is designed to meet your specific needs and bring your vision to life. The Advanced Blocks Pro offers a multitude of customization options, allowing you to create visually stunning web pages with ease.

Support

For support and help, visit https://advancedblocks.pro
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/advanced-blocks-pro directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
How does the Advanced Blocks Pro differ from other block plugins?

The Advanced Blocks Pro offers a wider range of customization options for each block, making it easier for you to create visually stunning web pages.

short_description: Transform your web page creation process with the Advanced Blocks Pro in Gutenberg editor's dynamic and feature-rich blocks.
description:
Transform your web page creation process with the Advanced Blocks Pro in Gutenberg editor’s dynamic and feature-rich blocks. With an extensive range of options, each block is designed to meet your specific needs and bring your vision to life. The Advanced Blocks Pro offers a multitude of customization options, allowing you to create visually stunning web pages with ease.

Support

For support and help, visit https://advancedblocks.pro

advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list.name: advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list
advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list.title: Icon List
advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list.description: Transform your lists into visually appealing displays with the Advanced Icon List plugin. Showcase unique and attention-grabbing SVG or icon bullets for each item, elevating your content and making it stand out.

advanced-blocks-pro/star-rating.name: advanced-blocks-pro/star-rating
advanced-blocks-pro/star-rating.title: Star Rating
advanced-blocks-pro/star-rating.description: Elevate your content's credibility with the Advanced Star Rating plugin. Beautifully display ratings, testimonials, and other types of reviews with an elegant and sophisticated star-rating system.

advanced-blocks-pro/heading.name: advanced-blocks-pro/heading
advanced-blocks-pro/heading.title: Heading
advanced-blocks-pro/heading.description: Elevate your WordPress posts with the Advanced Heading plugin's eye-catching and fashionable headings. Customize your headings with manual settings and add subheadings and separators for a polished look. Take your content to the next level with this simple and effective plugin.

advanced-blocks-pro/slider.name: advanced-blocks-pro/slider
advanced-blocks-pro/slider.title: Slider
advanced-blocks-pro/slider.description: Transform your website with mesmerizing image slideshows. The Image Slider block in the Gutenberg plugin makes it effortless to showcase your photos in an eye-catching and dynamic manner. Personalize your slider with customizable options like navigation controls, transitions, and more

advanced-blocks-pro/button.name: advanced-blocks-pro/button
advanced-blocks-pro/button.title: Button
advanced-blocks-pro/button.description: Make your WordPress posts pop with the Advanced Button's eye-catching links. Give your content an extra edge with this powerful and versatile plugin

advanced-blocks-pro/form.name: advanced-blocks-pro/form
advanced-blocks-pro/form.title: Form
advanced-blocks-pro/form.description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.

advanced-blocks-pro/video.name: advanced-blocks-pro/video
advanced-blocks-pro/video.title: Video
advanced-blocks-pro/video.description: Elevate your video content with the Advanced Video plugin. Choose your own heading tags, add subheadings and separators, and fully customize the look and feel of your videos with manual settings and options.

advanced-blocks-pro/section.name: advanced-blocks-pro/section
advanced-blocks-pro/section.title: Section
advanced-blocks-pro/section.description: Bring structure to your website building with the Advanced Outer Wrap Section plugin. Easily add and organize blocks within a customizable section, complete with adjustable layout options like background, border, and spacing.

advanced-blocks-pro/infobox.name: advanced-blocks-pro/infobox
advanced-blocks-pro/infobox.title: Info Box
advanced-blocks-pro/infobox.description: Transform your information with the Advanced Infobox plugin. Add eye-catching and interactive elements like images, icons, videos, headings, texts, icon lists, call-to-action buttons and more, creating dynamic and engaging information blocks.

responsive.desktop: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.​

advanced-blocks-pro/image.name: advanced-blocks-pro/image
advanced-blocks-pro/image.title: Image
advanced-blocks-pro/image.description: Elevate your visual content with the Advanced Image plugin. Optimize your photos for speed and efficiency with ease, making your WordPress website a visual delight.

advanced-blocks-pro/icon.name: advanced-blocks-pro/icon
advanced-blocks-pro/icon.title: Icon
advanced-blocks-pro/icon.description: Make your WordPress website stand out with the Advanced Icon plugin's stylish and scalable symbol fonts. Incorporate visually appealing pictograms into your content with ease and enhance your website's performance by using these faster-loading fonts instead of image-based icons.

advanced-blocks-pro/form-field-select.name: advanced-blocks-pro/form-field-select
advanced-blocks-pro/form-field-select.title: Form Field Select
advanced-blocks-pro/form-field-select.description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.

advanced-blocks-pro/form-field.name: advanced-blocks-pro/form-field
advanced-blocks-pro/form-field.title: Form Field
advanced-blocks-pro/form-field.description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.

advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list-child.name: advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list-child
advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list-child.title: Form Field
advanced-blocks-pro/icon-list-child.description: Make your list items pop with the Advanced Icon List plugin. Add a touch of visual interest with eye-catching SVG or icon bullets for each item, taking your content to the next level.

advanced-blocks-pro/column.name: advanced-blocks-pro/column
advanced-blocks-pro/column.title: Column
advanced-blocks-pro/column.description: Transform your layout with the Column plugin for Gutenberg. Easily organize your content into stunning, multi-column designs with customizable spacing, background, and borders.
